results.content:
This is a great intro course, but every course author does "intro" courses and nobody seems to ever venture into courses that tackle the more advanced aspects of Moodle development.

There are some bad coding practices shows here, like hard-coding string values in some examples while correctly using language strings in other examples.

results.content:
A cosa serve questo corso? Fa un solo report, del tutto inutile, quando moodle ha una base dati enorme e che avrebbe meritato di essere trattato.
A cosa mi serve fare un singolo report dei gruppi globali? Davvero una pessima esperienza, un'ora e mezza della mia vita buttata a casaccio.

response.content:
According to Google translate, this review states: "What is this course for? It makes only one report, completely useless, when moodle has a huge database that should have been treated. What do I need to do a single report of global groups? Really a bad experience, an hour and a half of my life thrown at random." 

While I am not happy to see that a student is dissatisfied, I would point out that 
1. The point of this class is to learn how to write a report, not to understand all of the Moodle database!
2. Writing a single report is a great approach for this class as it allows us to really focus on how the report works!
3. This is clearly advertised as a beginner level course... Please read the course overview and description before you enroll... 1 star reviews severely hurt my instructor rating!
